byline.original: By JAMES E. CARTWRIGHT and BRUCE G. BLAIR

abstract: Op-Ed article by James E Cartwright and Bruce G Blair of Global Zero Commission on Nuclear Risk Reduction underscores myriad benefits United States would gain by ruling out first use of nuclear weapons as option; urges Pres Obama to adopt no-first-use policy.

lead_paragraph: The United States has a policy allowing the first use of nuclear weapons. Abolishing it will save money and make the world safer.
